Feature engineering package¶

build_tag_features script¶

Functions used for building features compose of tags.

The book data contains information about what tags were assigned to books by users. Those tags include genres which can be very helpful when creating book representations.

booksuggest.features.build_tag_features.main(book_tags_filepath, output_filepath)¶

Calculates tag features for all books present in the book tags data frame and saves them to the specified output filepath.

Parameters:
  • book_tags – Data frame containg information about tags assigned to books.
  • output_filepath – Speficies the files in which the results should be saved.
exception booksuggest.features.build_tag_features.InvalidTagFeaturesError[source]¶

Bases: Exception

Exception signifying that the passed tag data is invalid.

booksuggest.features.build_tag_features.build_all_tag_features(book_tags, tags)[source]¶

Calculates tag features for all books in the provided book_tags data frame.

Each feature represents a single tag, the value if the feature is the count how many times this specific tag was assigned divided by the count of all assigned tags.

Parameters:
  • book_tags (DataFrame) – Data frame containing book_id and tag_id columns.
  • tags (DataFrame) – Data frame containing tag_id and tag_names columns.
Return type:

DataFrame
booksuggest.features.build_tag_features.build_tag_features(book_tags, tags)[source]¶

Builds tags based features for a single book.

Parameters:
  • book_tags (DataFrame) – Data frame containing book_id and tag_id columns.
  • tags (DataFrame) – Data frame containing tag_id and tag_names columns.
Return type:

List[float]
booksuggest.features.build_tag_features.check_book_tags_and_tags_compatibility(book_tags, tags)[source]¶

Checks if the book tags and tags data are compatible.

Parameters:
  • book_tags (DataFrame) – Data frame containing data about tags assigned to books.
  • tags (DataFrame) – Data frame containg information about tags.
Returns:

True if data frames are compatible.
Return type:

bool

Checks if the book tags data frame contains valid data.

Parameters:book_tags (DataFrame) – Data frame to check.
Returns:True if the data frame is a valid book_tags data frame.
Return type:bool
